modName: Fachry Knight Order Nord Raider Vampire
summary: This mod adds three new small settlement in new world to see with some unique in game armor and weapon.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][size=4][b]Fachry Knight Order Nord Raider Vampire[/b][/size]

[b]>> WARNING +18 <<[/b]
This is my peronal Mod For Fun, which mean all the things or NPC this Mod Added all for my Personal Fun.
I Don't encourage you or any other to use this mod Without the "Requirement"
if you don't want to Download the necercary "Requirement"
I Suggest DO NOT DOWNLOAD This mod.
[b]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b]>> Location <<[/b]
[/size][/font][/b][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Near Riverwood map marked as Fire Gates[/size][/font][b]

[/b][b]>> GAMEPLAY <<[/b]
You may kill some or all NPC on this mod because they are made to respawn but it may take some time.
but be carefull they all prety though and try to not kill the merchant
so you can sell or buy from them. Have Fun!!!

[b]>> Requirement <<[/b]
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Heartfires.esm
Dragonborn.esm
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT[/url]

[b][u]> > Required for HDT < <[/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by [b]xp32[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions by [b]HydrogensaysHDT[/b][/url]

[b]Installation : [/b]
NMM or copy to data folder

[b]Uninstall : [/b]
Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder

[b]Recommended : [/b]
The LOOT
[b]
Credit : [/b]
BETHESDA
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by [b]Caliente[/b][/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13486/?]Winter Is Coming - Cloaks by [b]Nivea[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair by [b]Apachii[/b][/url]


Please leave a comment and endorsement
"Thank you for download"[/size][/font][/center]
author: Fachry
